getServiceProvider

public static <T> Provider<T> getServiceProvider(ServiceRegistry registry,
                                                 TypeLiteral<T> target,
                                                 Service spec)
Creates a dynamic service provider for the given ServiceRegistry. The provider is configured to use the Service API and LDAP filter.

Parameters:
registry - dynamic service registry
target - literal type of the target
spec - optional service specification
Returns:
dynamic service provider
